33  package edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.cache;
34  import java.io.File;
35  import java.net.MalformedURLException;
36  import java.net.URL;
37  import java.util.Map;
38  import java.util.regex.Matcher;
39  import java.util.regex.Pattern;
40  
41  import org.apache.commons.lang.StringUtils;
42  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
43  
44  import edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.cfg.GrouperCacheConfig;
45  import edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.misc.GrouperVersion;
46  import edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.util.GrouperUtil;
47  import net.sf.ehcache.Cache;
48  import net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager;
49  import net.sf.ehcache.Statistics;
50  import net.sf.ehcache.config.CacheConfiguration;
51  import net.sf.ehcache.config.Configuration;
52  import net.sf.ehcache.config.DiskStoreConfiguration;
53  
54  
55  
56  /**
57   * Base class for common cache operations.
58   * @author  blair christensen.
59   * @version $Id: EhcacheController.java,v 1.13 2009-08-11 20:34:18 mchyzer Exp $
60   * @since   1.2.1
61   */
62  public class EhcacheController implements CacheController {
63  
64    /**
65     * singleton cache controller
66     */
67    private static EhcacheController ehcacheController = null;
68  
69    /**
70     * utility cache controller if you dont want to create your own...
71     * @return ehcache controller
72     */
73    public static EhcacheController ehcacheController() {
74      if (ehcacheController == null) {
75        ehcacheController = new EhcacheController();
76      }
77      return ehcacheController;
78    }
79  
80    /**
81     * manager
82     */
83    private CacheManager mgr;
84  
85    /**
86     * @see java.lang.Object#finalize()
87     */
88    @Override
89    protected void finalize() throws Throwable {
90      super.finalize();
91      this.stop();
92    }
93  
94    /**
95     * @see edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.privs.AccessResolver#stop()
96     */
97    public void stop() {
98      if (this.mgr != null) {
99        synchronized(CacheManager.class) {
100         this.mgr.shutdown();
101       }
102     }
103   }
104 
105  
106   /**
107    * not public since we only want one of these...
108    * Initialize caching.
109    * @since   2.1.0
110    */
111   private EhcacheController() {
112   }
113 
114 
115 
116   /**
117    * Flush all caches.
118    * @since   1.2.1
119    */
120   public void flushCache() {
121     if (this.mgr != null) {
122       this.mgr.clearAll(); // TODO 20070823 how much of a performance hit is calling this method?
123     }
124   }
125 
126   /**
127    * Retrieve a grouper cache (like a generic Map)
128    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
129    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
130    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
131    * @since   1.2.1
132    */
133   public GrouperCache getGrouperCache(String name) 
134     throws  IllegalStateException { 
135     //dont use defaults
136     return getGrouperCache(name, false, -1, false, -1, -1, false);
137   }
138   
139   /**
140    * Retrieve a GrouperCache which is a generic Map cache.  Note the defaults are only used
141    * in the first invocation of the cache retrieval.
142    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
143    * @param useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile use the defaults if not in the config file
144    * @param defaultMaxElementsInMemory if not in config file, this is max elements in memory
145    * @param defaultEternal if not in config file,  true to never expire stuff
146    * @param defaultTimeToIdleSeconds  if not in config file, time where if not accessed, will expire
147    * @param defaultTimeToLiveSeconds  if not in config file, time where even if accessed, will expire
148    * @param defaultOverflowToDisk  if not in config file, if it should go to disk in overflow
149    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
150    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
151    * @since   1.2.1
152    */
153   public GrouperCache getGrouperCache(String name, boolean useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile,
154       int defaultMaxElementsInMemory, 
155       boolean defaultEternal, int defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
156       int defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, boolean defaultOverflowToDisk) 
157     throws  IllegalStateException { 
158     return new GrouperCache(this.getCache(name, useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile, 
159         defaultMaxElementsInMemory, defaultEternal, defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
160         defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, defaultOverflowToDisk));
161   }
162   
163   /**
164    * Note, this might be better to be used from GrouperCache
165    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
166    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
167    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
168    * @since   1.2.1
169    */
170   public Cache getCache(String name) 
171     throws  IllegalStateException { 
172     //dont use defaults
173     return getCache(name, false, -1, false, -1, -1, false);
174   }
175   
176   /**
177    * Note, this might be better to be used from GrouperCache
178    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
179    * @param useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile use the defaults if not in the config file
180    * @param defaultMaxElementsInMemory if not in config file, this is max elements in memory
181    * @param defaultEternal if not in config file,  true to never expire stuff
182    * @param defaultTimeToIdleSeconds  if not in config file, time where if not accessed, will expire
183    * @param defaultTimeToLiveSeconds  if not in config file, time where even if accessed, will expire
184    * @param defaultOverflowToDisk  if not in config file, if it should go to disk in overflow
185    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
186    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
187    * @since   1.2.1
188    */
189   public Cache getCache(String name, boolean useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile,
190       int defaultMaxElementsInMemory, 
191       boolean defaultEternal, int defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
192       int defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, boolean defaultOverflowToDisk) 
193     throws  IllegalStateException { 
194     this.initialize();
195     if (this.mgr.cacheExists(name) ) {
196       return this.mgr.getCache(name);
197     }
198     if (useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile) {
199       if (LOG != null) {
200         LOG.info("cache not configured explicitly: " + name + ", to override default values, " +
201         		"configure in the resource /grouper.cache.base.properties and /grouper.cache.properties.  Default values are:" +
202         		"maxElementsInMemory: " + defaultMaxElementsInMemory + ", eternal: " + defaultEternal
203         		+ ", timeToIdleSeconds: " + defaultTimeToIdleSeconds + ", timeToLiveSeconds: " 
204         		+ defaultTimeToLiveSeconds + ", overFlowToDisk: " + defaultOverflowToDisk);
205       }
206       Cache cache = new Cache(name, defaultMaxElementsInMemory, defaultOverflowToDisk, 
207           defaultEternal, defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, defaultTimeToIdleSeconds);
208       //TODO CH 20081118, see if cache by name there already...
209       this.mgr.addCache(cache);
210       return cache;
211     }
212     
213     throw new IllegalStateException("cache not found: " + name + " make sure the cache" +
214         " config is correct, the resource: /grouper.cache.base.properties and /grouper.cache.properties");
215   }
216 
217   /** logger */
218   private static final Log LOG = GrouperUtil.getLog(EhcacheController.class);
219 
220   /**
221    * @param cache 
222    * @return  ehcache statistics for <i>cache</i>.
223    * @since   1.2.1
224    */
225   public CacheStats getStats(String cache) {
226     //not sure if we need to initialize, since no stats will be found...
227     this.initialize();
228     Cache c = this.getCache(cache);
229     c.setStatisticsAccuracy(Statistics.STATISTICS_ACCURACY_GUARANTEED);
230     return new EhcacheStats( c.getStatistics() );
231   }
232 
233   /** 
234    * Initialize privilege cache.
235    * @since   1.2.1
236    */
237   public void initialize() {
238     if (this.mgr == null) {
239       synchronized(EhcacheController.class) {
240         if (this.mgr == null) {
241 
242           URL grouperCachePropertiesUrl = this.getClass().getResource("/grouper.cache.properties");
243           URL ehcacheUrl = null;
244           boolean ehcacheXmlEligible = !GrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase("2.3.1").greaterOrEqualToArg(GrouperVersion.currentVersion());
245           if (!ehcacheXmlEligible) {
246             ehcacheUrl = null;
247           } else {
248             ehcacheUrl = this.getClass().getResource("/ehcache.xml");
249           }
250 
251           //trying to avoid warning of using the same dir
252           String tmpDir = GrouperUtil.tmpDir();
253           try {
254             String newTmpdir = StringUtils.trimToEmpty(tmpDir);
255             if (!newTmpdir.endsWith("\\") && !newTmpdir.endsWith("/")) {
256               newTmpdir += File.separator;
257             }
258             newTmpdir += "grouper_ehcache_auto_" + GrouperUtil.uniqueId();
259             System.setProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR, newTmpdir);
260           
261             synchronized(CacheManager.class) {
262 
263               if (grouperCachePropertiesUrl != null && ehcacheUrl != null) {
264                 if (ehcacheXmlEligible) {
265                   LOG.error("ERROR: You have an ehache.xml and grouper.cache.properties on the classpath, "
266                     + "you should only have one or the other.  "
267                     + "You should probably delete the ehcache.xml file.");
268                 } else {
269                   LOG.error("ERROR: You have an ehache.xml on the classpath, "
270                       + "you should the ehcache.xml file.");
271                 }
272               }
273 
274               boolean configured = false;
275               
276               //if no grouper.cache.properties url, and an ehcache.xml, then use that
277               if (ehcacheXmlEligible && grouperCachePropertiesUrl == null && ehcacheUrl != null) {
278                 LOG.debug("Configuring ehcache with ehcache.xml");
279                 //now it should be using a unique directory
280                 this.mgr = new CacheManager(ehcacheUrl);
281 
282                 configured = true;
283               }
284               
285               GrouperCacheConfig grouperCacheConfig = configured ? null : GrouperCacheConfig.retrieveConfig();
286               if (!configured) {
287 
288                 //use config file?
289                 String ehcacheXmlFile = grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueString("grouper.cache.ehcache.xml.filename");
290                 
291                 if (!StringUtils.isBlank(ehcacheXmlFile)) {
292                   LOG.debug("Configuring ehcache with xml file configured in grouper.cache.properties: " + ehcacheXmlFile);
293                   try {
294                     ehcacheUrl = new File(ehcacheXmlFile).toURI().toURL();
295                   } catch (MalformedURLException mue) {
296                     throw new RuntimeException(mue);
297                   }
298                   this.mgr = new CacheManager(ehcacheUrl);
299                   configured = true;
300                 }
301               }
302               if (!configured) {
303 
304                 //use config file?
305                 String ehcacheXmlResource = grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueString("grouper.cache.ehcache.xml.resource");
306                 
307                 if (!StringUtils.isBlank(ehcacheXmlResource)) {
308                   LOG.debug("Configuring ehcache with xml resource configured in grouper.cache.properties: " + ehcacheXmlResource);
309                   ehcacheUrl = this.getClass().getResource(ehcacheXmlResource);
310                   this.mgr = new CacheManager(ehcacheUrl);
311                   configured = true;
312                 }
313               }
314 
315               if (!configured) {
316                 LOG.debug("Configuring ehcache with grouper.cache.properties");
317                 Configuration ehcacheConfiguration = new Configuration();
318                 
319                 //disk store
320                 {
321                   DiskStoreConfiguration diskStoreConfiguration = new DiskStoreConfiguration();
322                   diskStoreConfiguration.setPath(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueStringRequired("grouper.cache.diskStorePath"));
323                   ehcacheConfiguration.addDiskStore(diskStoreConfiguration);
324                 }
325 
326                 {
327                   //default cache
328                   CacheConfiguration defaultCache = new CacheConfiguration();
329                   assignCacheFromProperties(grouperCacheConfig, defaultCache, "cache.defaultCache");
330                   ehcacheConfiguration.addDefaultCache(defaultCache);
331                 }
332                 
333                 //set all caches
334                 Pattern ehcachePattern = Pattern.compile("^(cache\\.name\\.[^.]+)\\.name$");
335                 Map<String, String> cacheNameMap = grouperCacheConfig.propertiesMap(ehcachePattern);
336                 for (String propertyKey : cacheNameMap.keySet()) {
337                   Matcher matcher = ehcachePattern.matcher(propertyKey);
338                   matcher.matches();
339                   String configPrefix = matcher.group(1);
340                   CacheConfiguration cacheConfiguration = new CacheConfiguration();
341                   assignCacheFromProperties(grouperCacheConfig, cacheConfiguration, configPrefix);
342                   ehcacheConfiguration.addCache(cacheConfiguration);
343                 }
344 
345                 this.mgr = new CacheManager(ehcacheConfiguration);
346 
347                 configured = true;
348 
349               }
350               if (!configured) {
351                 throw new RuntimeException("ehcache is not configured, do you have a "
352                     + "grouper.cache.properties and grouper.cache.base.properties on your classpath?");
353               }
354             }
355           } finally {
356             
357             //put tmpdir back
358             if (tmpDir == null) {
359               System.clearProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR);
360             } else {
361               System.setProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR, tmpDir);
362             }
363           }
364         }
365       }
366     }
367   }
368 
369   /**
370    * assign cache from properties
371    * @param grouperCacheConfig 
372    * @param cacheConfiguration
373    * @param propertyPrefix
374    */
375   private static void assignCacheFromProperties(GrouperCacheConfig grouperCacheConfig, CacheConfiguration cacheConfiguration, String propertyPrefix) {
376     //  cache.defaultCache.maxElementsInMemory = 1000
377     //  cache.defaultCache.eternal = 1000
378     //  cache.defaultCache.timeToIdleSeconds = 1000
379     //  cache.defaultCache.timeToLiveSeconds = 1000
380     //  cache.defaultCache.overflowToDisk = false
381     //  cache.defaultCache.statistics = false
382     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".name")) {
383       cacheConfiguration.setName(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueStringRequired(propertyPrefix + ".name"));
384     }
385     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".maxElementsInMemory")) {
386       cacheConfiguration.setMaxElementsInMemory(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueInt(propertyPrefix + ".maxElementsInMemory"));
387     }
388     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".eternal")) {
389       cacheConfiguration.setEternal(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueBooleanRequired(propertyPrefix + ".eternal"));
390     }
391     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".timeToIdleSeconds")) {
392       cacheConfiguration.setTimeToIdleSeconds(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueInt(propertyPrefix + ".timeToIdleSeconds"));
393     }
394     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".timeToLiveSeconds")) {
395       cacheConfiguration.setTimeToLiveSeconds(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueInt(propertyPrefix + ".timeToLiveSeconds"));
396     }
397     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".overflowToDisk")) {
398       cacheConfiguration.setOverflowToDisk(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueBooleanRequired(propertyPrefix + ".overflowToDisk"));
399     }
400     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".statistics")) {
401       cacheConfiguration.setStatistics(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueBooleanRequired(propertyPrefix + ".statistics"));
402     }
403 
404   }
405   
406 }
